name: Deer Sniper 2017 3D
description:
Deer Sniper 2017 3D is free to play, Deer Sniper 2017 3D is an realistic and exotic wild animals and deer hunting game of 2017 where your huntsman show shooting and sniping skills and also improve these skills.

FEATURES
Amazing First Person Sniper (FPS) 3D shooting for animal and Sniper Shooting experience.
High quality new generation graphics
3D Dangerous Realistic Jungle/Forest Environment
Powerful Amazing shooting weapons
Zoom camera to get perfect shots
